data.text: For the second year in a row, we were recognized as a Five Star Global Airline by the @theAPEXassoc. Thank you to our passengers for their preference; we continue working to bring you the best flying experience. #TogetherWeKeepFlying https://t.co/3pdZyLgQ4W
